metadata.title: CVE-2025-0240 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Parsing a JavaScript module as JSON could, under some circumstances, causecross-compartment access, which may result in a use-after-free. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 134 and Firefox ESR < 128.6.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
